column4: hey i need help with an atheros wifi card that is being totally stubborn; i've been following this tutorial http://www.ubuntugeek.com/how-to-get-atheros-ar5007eg-or-ar242x-wireless-cards-may-be-other-models-working-in-ubuntu-810-intrepid-ibex.html and i have an error message when i bash in "sudo make unload"
i think you need the source code to uninstall it
BIOS passwords are not an ubuntu issue, try ##hardware]#
